installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# TM2 Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apt-get update
apt-get -y install wget curl zip unzip

cd /mnt/server
wget http://files.v04.maniaplanet.com/server/ManiaplanetServer_Latest.zip
unzip ManiaplanetServer_Latest.zip
cd Packs
wget https://maniaplanet.com/ingame/public/titles/download/TMStadium@nadeo.Title.Pack.gbx
cp /mnt/server/UserData/Config/dedicated_cfg.default.txt /mnt/server/UserData/Config/dedicated_cfg.txt
